6:
n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    for i in range(3):
        l, r = map(int, input().split())
        b = list(map(int, input().split()))
        for j in range(l-1, r):
            a[j] += b[j-l+1]
    print(*a)
7:
n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    for i in range(3):
        l, r = map(int, input().split())
        b = list(map(int, input().split()))
        for j in range(l-1, r):
            a[j] += b[j-l+1] // (r-l+1)
    print(*a)
